name: 2022 5th International Conference on Education Technology Management
content: Publication: All papers will be strictly double blind reviewed by the program committee and reviewers, and accepted papers of ICETM 2022 after registration and presentation will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 978-1-4503-9802-2), which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc.
